abstract: Some American companies are exploiting temporary work visa programs, known as H1-B visas, instituted by Congress to help boost economy and create jobs at home, and instead are using the visa programs to ultimately move jobs overseas; companies bring in foreign workers, primarily from Indian outsourcing and consulting firms, to learn jobs of American workers; jobs are then taught to replacements in India and American workers are laid off.
lead_paragraph: A federal program intended to bring in workers with special skills is being used by some American companies to hire and train other foreign workers.

headline.main: Toys ‘R’ Us Brings Temporary Foreign Workers to U.S. to Move Jobs Overseas
headline.print_headline: Toys “R” Us Brings Temporary Foreign Workers to U.S. to Move Jobs Overseas

snippet: A federal program intended to bring in workers with special skills is being used by some American companies to hire and train other foreign workers.
